name: Sea Ninja
description:
Please play the game in fullscreen.
Sea Ninja

Dogshit name, alright game! - @JoeBiden(Probably)

We need your help, ninja! The people from above have dropped trash on our city, and it's causing pollution and death!

We've tried to get it ourselves, but we get stuck in the trash, and can't swim! That's why we need your help.

Swing through the seas, collecting trash and avoiding the wildlife! Go through 11 different levels, each with more challange than the last!

NOTES:

- I was unable to get a background because I'm lazy.

- There are glitches. Cope and reload.

- Enjoy!
